reviews.review_msg: Derek is an amazing professor. It's amazing how he genuinely cares about every student and does not have any any bias towards specific students unlike many other professors at SFU. He did take a while to grade everything but I would say he is fair to his students. Great lectures as well!

Derek is a great statistics professor. His lectures are entertaining and he provides a lot of real-life examples. I struggled a lot during the semester, but he helped me a lot outside of class during the office hours and replying to my emails.
This class is hard by nature, by Rick makes it bearable. Exams are open book but still pretty hard.  Project is easy though and worth alot.
Dr. Stats makes Statistics interesting and exciting!
Prof Wang is super caring and helpful. The class is relatively light and easy for someone with a statistics background. If you ever get stuck, she will always help you during her office hours.
She is a nice person. But a bad prof. The material is not hard, grading is kinda harsh. She does not respond to email, this is what pisses me off.
Reads from a PDF, no context or conceptual learning
Every lecture seemed put together the day before or from another course. We barely covered any material and what we did didn't seem relevant. The notes were excellent (much better than the lectures).
